content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or feelings about Too Short's music, but objectively, Too Short has had a long and successful career in the music industry, having released many hit songs and albums over several decades. While his music has faced criticisms for its explicit lyrics and objectification of women, it's worth noting that his influence has been felt in the hip hop genre and throughout pop culture. 

Whether or not his music continues to be relevant today ultimately comes down to personal opinion; some people may still appreciate his contributions to the genre, while others may not agree with the messaging in his music. However, it's important to consider the bigger picture and acknowledge the negative impacts that negative messaging can have on our communities, particularly on young people.
